name: Flip and run (LouShunt)
description:
How to play

You can move using WASD or the arrows on the keyboard. Use your mouse to rotate the flashlight. Teddy bears don't like light.

Trijam

This game was made for the Trijam #149. The theme was Flipped. There was a 3 hour limit to play games but I went over and it took me a little over 3 hours to make. Even though I failed to make a game within the time limit, I wanted to share what I had done. I made the game in 3 hours and 30 minutes.

Idea

Did you too when you were little flipped the light switch and run back to your bed so monster in the dark didn't have time to get you ? In this game, you need to do this but this time, you have a reason to run. Teddy bears will run torward you and try to kill you. Go back to your bed without getting catch.

Art

I used the Tiny Bundle pack made by Vryell. All the visuals were taken in this pack. No art were made during the game jam. Go take a look at Vryell's work it's amazing!
